definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Second, it absolves voters of responsibility for their problems.
sentences.chinese: 其次，民粹主義爲選民自身的責任開脫。

sentences.english: The city of Memphis is promoting a populist approach to culture.
sentences.chinese: 孟菲斯市在推行文化的民粹主義道路。

sentences.english: That’s because voters aren’t as stupid as the populists imagine.
sentences.chinese: 其實，選民並不如民粹主義者想象的那樣愚蠢。

sentences.english: On many of these populist measures, France is isolated.
sentences.chinese: 在許多民粹主義的舉措上，法國孤立無援。
共和黨裏有民粹主義者。

sentences.english: Revolutionary populism does not have the steep trajectory that it does in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 民粹主義革命並不像中東那樣有着陡然的進程。

sentences.english: Japanese politics is tainted with egoism and populism.
sentences.chinese: 日本政治帶有利己主義和民粹主義的風氣。

sentences.english: The populists could succeed simply by undoing the mistakes of the present regime.
sentences.chinese: 民粹主義可能只要糾正當前體制的錯誤就能成功。

sentences.english: Populist measures need to be replaced with non-corrupt developmental and progressive actions from the top.
sentences.chinese: 民粹主義措施應該被上層的發展和進步行動取代。

pinyin: mao4 yi4 bao3 hu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
could happen at any moment/on the verge
bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
